GET /servers/:serverId/cpu
GET /servers/:serverId/mem
GET /servers/:serverId/net
GET /servers
GET /servers/:serverId

servers
PKid: INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
UNip: VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
UNhostname: VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL

cpus
PKid: INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
FK1server_id: INT NOT NULL
percent: FLOAT NOT NULL

date: DATETIME NOT NULL

mems
PKid: INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
FK1server_id: INT NOT NULL
free: INT NOT NULL

used: INT NOT NULL

date: DATETIME NOT NULL

nets
PKid: INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
FK1server_id: INT NOT NULL
rx: INT NOT NULL

tx: INT NOT NULL

date: DATETIME NOT NULL
ERD Bachman's Notation
Cardinality (One)
Cardinality (Many)
Mandatory, One
Mandatory, Many
Optional, One
Optional, Many

ServerMatcherMiddleware


+ process(pReq, pReq, pNext)

// check if the ip address send by

 the server has been seen or not,

 if it hasn't, create a server entry 

in the servers table.  

// attach the serverId to the 

pReq.server.serverId

Cpu

- id: int

- serverId: int

- percent: float

- date: Date

+ getters / setters

Mems

- id: int

- serverId: int

- free: int

- used: int

- date: Date

+ getters
+ setters

Servers

- id: int

- ip: String

- hostname: String

+ getters

+ setters

Nets

- id: int

- serverId: int

- rx: int

- tx: int

- date: Date

+ getters
+ setters

ServersController.js

Load all the servers using 

the ServersService

ServerController.js

Load all cpu data using

CpusService.getCpus


Load all net data using

NetsService.getNets


Load all mems data using

MemsService.getMems

Servers.tpl

display the services

loaded by the controller

Server.tpl

Render charts for

- cpu data

- net data

- mem data

<font color="#ffffff" style="font-size: 36px">Server To Monitor</font>
<font style="font-size: 36px">stethoscope.js</font>

MemSteth.js
Module 
{
  breath: function () {
    returns memory usage
// could use "free" command
  }
}

main{
var mem=  MemSteth.breath();
var cpu = CpuSteth.breath();
var net = NetSteth.breath();

MemStethService.report(mem);
CpuStethService.report(cpu);
NetStethService.report(net);
}

NetSteth.js
Module 
{
  breath: function () {
    returns net usage
//// could use "netstat -i"  command
  }
}

CpuSteth.js
Module 
{
  breath: function () {
    returns cpu usage
// could use:
grep 'cpu' /proc/stat | awk '{usage=($2+$4)*100/($2+$4+$5)} END {print usage}'
  }
}

MemStethService.js
Module 
{
  breath: function (data) {
    post data to server
  }
}

NetStethService.js
Module 
{
  report: function (data) {
    post data to server
  }
}

CpuStethService.js
Module 
{
  report: function (data) {
    post data to server
  }
}
